import React from 'react'; import '../App.css'; import { Button } from './ValuesButton'; import './About.css'; function AboutSection() { return (

About


London-based Finance and Technology startup which delivers Finance and Risk consulting, delivers change projects and develops prototypes. Specialised in Excel (VBA) and Python.




Founder: Adrian Hough, BCom, MBA


Finance, Risk and Change professional who has worked at Deutsche Bank, Centrica Energy, RBC Capital and Bank of America in London.


Successfully delivered projects across asset classes such as Commodities, Structured Finance (ABS, CMBS & CRE), Derivatives, Fixed Income and Emerging Markets.


Winner of the 2019 Centre for Finance, Technology and Entrepreneurship (CFTE) Onfido Extrapreneurship competition and member of the CFTE alumni committee.

); } export default AboutSection;
